page.title: 15Leisure and Recreation
page.content: Garton is a tiny village with almost no recreational facilities. There are no sports facilities or village hall. Two organizations, a Darby and Joan Club and Garton Wives meet regularly. A keep fit class meets at the school during the winter months. A questionnaire revealed that a majority of people would like a public house and a village hall. It was found that the villagers have a very wide range of hobbies and interests, gardening being by far the most popular. In spite of the poor recreational facilities 82% of the people who answered the questionnaire spend most of their spare time in Garton and 98% like living in the village. About 60% take their holidays in different parts of the U.K. while 16% go abroad. The remainder prefer to holiday in Garton.
